Uniswap V2 Sniperbot is an automated trading bot designed to buy tokens immediately after they are listed on Uniswap V2. The bot allows fine-grained control over entry price, trade size, stop loss and execution strategy.

Use Case

  • Monitoring new pair creation on Uniswap V2
  • Instant buy at listing time
  • Automated risk management
  • Hands-off execution during token launches

Core Features

  • Real-time detection of newly deployed Uniswap V2 pairs
  • Configurable buy price and amount
  • Stop loss and take profit logic
  • Gas price and slippage control
  • Transaction retry and failure handling

Architecture

  • Event-driven architecture
  • Direct interaction with Uniswap V2 smart contracts
  • WebSocket-based blockchain listeners
  • Config-driven strategy parameters

Tech Stack

  • Node.js
  • ethers.js
  • Web3 APIs
  • Uniswap V2 contracts
  • Ethereum JSON-RPC
